patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
+    <solid android:color="#CC00"></solid>
+    <corners android:radius="30dp"></corners>
+</shape>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -7,30 +7,37 @@
     android:background="#A3D5D5D5"
     tools:context=".AddGame">
 
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/editTextCatMod"
+        android:layout_width="411dp"
+        android:layout_height="40dp"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView3" />
+
     <TextView
         android:id="@+id/textView8"
         android:layout_width="0dp"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_marginBottom="4dp"
         android:background="#0003A9F4"
         android:text="  Enlace a youtube"
         android:textColor="#000000"
         android:textSize="18sp"
         android:textStyle="bold"
-        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/editTextYoutubeMod"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
         app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
-        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextDesarMod" />
 
     <EditText
         android:id="@+id/editTextYoutubeMod"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="45dp"
-        android:layout_marginTop="104dp"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
         app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
         app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextValMod" />
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView8" />
 
     <TextView
         android:id="@+id/textView7"
@@ -41,9 +48,9 @@
         android:textColor="#000000"
         android:textSize="18sp"
         android:textStyle="bold"
-        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/editTextDesarMod"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextValMod" />
 
     <TextView
         android:id="@+id/textView3"
@@ -54,10 +61,10 @@
         android:textColor="#000000"
         android:textSize="18sp"
         android:textStyle="bold"
-        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/editTextCatMod"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
         app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
-        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextTitolMod" />
 
     <TextView
         android:id="@+id/textView5"
@@ -87,36 +94,38 @@
         app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
         app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextYoutubeMod" />
 
-    <EditText
-        android:id="@+id/editTextTitolMod"
-        android:layout_width="match_parent"
-        android:layout_height="45dp"
-        android:layout_marginBottom="25dp"
-        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/editTextCatMod"
-        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
-        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/btDelete"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="55dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="75dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/br_borrar"
+        android:text="Borrar"
+        android:textSize="24sp"
+        android:textStyle="bold"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/modGame"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/modGame"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextYoutubeMod"
+        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.802" />
 
     <EditText
-        android:id="@+id/editTextCatMod"
-        android:layout_width="match_parent"
-        android:layout_height="45dp"
-        android:layout_marginTop="25dp"
+        android:id="@+id/editTextTitolMod"
+        android:layout_width="414dp"
+        android:layout_height="40dp"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
         app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
         app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextTitol" />
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView2" />
 
     <EditText
         android:id="@+id/editTextAnyMod"
         android:layout_width="154dp"
         android:layout_height="40dp"
-        android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
         app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextValMod"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/textView5"
-        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextCatMod" />
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
 
     <EditText
         android:id="@+id/editTextValMod"
@@ -147,10 +156,10 @@
         android:id="@+id/editTextDesarMod"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="45dp"
-        android:layout_marginTop="28dp"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
         app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/editTextValMod" />
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView7" />
 
     <TextView
         android:id="@+id/textView2"
@@ -163,6 +172,7 @@
         android:textStyle="bold"
         app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/editTextTitol"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="1.0"
         app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
         app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
